description: Controls keypad-shield with auto-off for backlight
name: keypad-shield

attachments.content:
__time(ms)	TARG	RATE	UPD	OUT
0	1	1	pulse	0
100	1	1	pulse	0.1
350	1	1	pulse	0.35~
900	1	1	pulse	0.9
1000	1	1	pulse	1
1500	1	1	pulse	1
1600	1	1	no-pulse	1
1999	0	0.1	no-pulse	1
2000	0	0.1	pulse	1~
2500	0	0.1	pulse	0.95~
3000	NaN	1	pulse	NaN
4000	1	NaN	pulse	1
5000	1	Inf	pulse	1
6000	-1	Inf	pulse	-1
7000	-100	-Inf	pulse	Inf
8000	Inf	-Inf	pulse	Inf

HyxHauxYp8.description: Triggers an update (i.e. recalculation) of `OUT` value. Keep the value set to `Continuously` to achieve the most smooth animation possible.
HyxHauxYp8.label: UPD

S1VSTdxYaI.description: The target value to strive for.
S1VSTdxYaI.label: TARG

SyXB6_lt68.description: Speed rate in units per second.
SyXB6_lt68.label: RATE

B1-MPktxYTL.description: Returns true while down button is pressed.
B1-MPktxYTL.label: DOWN

B1Fv1FxFTI.description: Returns true while select button is pressed.
B1Fv1FxFTI.label: SELECT

BJ2MP1tgta8.description: Returns true while up button is pressed.
BJ2MP1tgta8.label: UP

ByzfPktgt6I.description:
Pulse enables backlight for the set time.

Works only if BL-Auto is TRUE.
ByzfPktgt6I.label: BL-a-light

H1eQP1FxtaL.description:
Backlight remain on duration in seconds.

Functional only if BL-Auto is TRUE.
H1eQP1FxtaL.label: BL-t

H1ev1teYTU.description: Returns true while left button is pressed.
H1ev1teYTU.label: LEFT

H1uzwyYeFpL.description: Backlight control port of LCD display
H1uzwyYeFpL.label: BL-Port (D10)

HJmMv1FgFTI.description: Returns true while right button is pressed.
HJmMv1FgFTI.label: RIGHT

SkCvyFeFaL.description:
Backlight fade off time.

If 0, b<acklight will switch to OFF state instanteniously.
SkCvyFeFaL.label: BL-fade-t

SkrlvJKeYa8.description:
Brightness of LCD Display in OFF state [0,1]

Must be smaller than BL-H-Brighness.
SkrlvJKeYa8.label: BL-L-Brightness

Skz7v1KgtaL.description: If TRUE,  backlight is turned off automatically after set time. It will be turned on if a key is pressed or pulse recieved from BL-a-light pin.
Skz7v1KgtaL.label: BL-Auto

Sy5lD1txF6L.description: String input is displayed on second line of LCD display
Sy5lD1txF6L.label: L2

r1cvkYlYaI.description: String input is displayed on first line of LCD display
r1cvkYlYaI.label: L1

rkDWPktxY6L.description: Returns true while no button is pressed.
rkDWPktxY6L.label: NONE

ryPPyYlYpL.description: LCD Display is updated upon change of input if TRUE
ryPPyYlYpL.label: ACT

rytlP1Yxtp8.description:
Brightness of LCD Display when in ON state [0,1]

Must be greater than BL-L-Brighness.
rytlP1Yxtp8.label: BL-H-Brightness
